lines.gurmukhi: Awidq Aau som Bom buD hUM bRhspq; sukr snIcr swqo bwr bwNt lIny hY [

Unknown.translation: Starting from Sunday, all seven days of the week are overtaken by the gods like, Sun, Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus and Saturn respectively.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Awidk sUrj Aqy som cMdRmw Bom mMgl buD Aqy bRhspqI vIr dyv gurU sukR dYq gurU snIcr CinCr eynwˆ s`qwˆ gRih srUp dyviqAwˆ ny s`qwˆ vwrwˆ nUM hI Awpxy ih`sy pw ilAw[

lines.gurmukhi: iQiq pC mws ruiq logn mY logcwr; eyk eykMkwr kau n koaU idn dIny hY [

Unknown.translation: For fulfillment of all rites and rituals related to god-land, the society has further divided the time into bright and dark period. (waxing and wanning of moon) twelve months and six seasons. But not a day has been set aside for the remembrance and in the

lines.gurmukhi: jnm AstmI rwm naumI eykwdsI BeI; duAwdsI cqurdsI jnmu ey kIny hY [

Unknown.translation: God is free of births but Janam Ashtami, Ram Naumi and Ekadashi are the birth days of Lord Krishna, Lord Rama, and god Haribasar. Duadasi is the day of Vaman god, while Chaudasi is the day of Narsinh. These days have been fixed as birthdays of these gods.

lines.gurmukhi: prjw aupwrjn ko n koaU pwvY idn; AjonI jnmu idnu khO kYsy cIny hY [484[

Unknown.translation: No one can tell the day of the creation of this cosmos. Then how can one know the birthday of such Lord who is Ajuni (beyond birth) ? Thus worship of gods who are born and who die is futile. Worship of eternal Lord is only purposeful.  (484)
